title: Harmonic Superspace: Some New Trends
abstract: We give a brief account of two recent applications of the harmonic superspace method: (i) an off-shell description of torsionful $(4,4)$ supersymmetric $2D$ sigma models in the framework of $SU(2)\times SU(2)$ harmonic superspace and (ii) the harmonic superspace formulation of ``small'' $N=4$ $SU(2)$ superconformal algebra and the related super KdV hierarchy.
